questions.q: Which type of glue expands as it dries, making it useful for filling small gaps and offering water resistance?
What is the main advantage of epoxy glue in woodworking?
options: Creates a very strong and waterproof bond
questions.answer: Creates a very strong and waterproof bond

questions.q: Which clamp is specifically designed for large panels, doors, or tabletops?
Which of the following safety practices should always be observed when gluing and clamping?
options: Avoid ventilation to prevent glue from drying too fast
Wear gloves and work in a well-ventilated area
questions.answer: Wear gloves and work in a well-ventilated area

questions.q: A Speed Clamp (Quick-Grip Clamp) is most useful when:
options: Holding large tabletops under heavy pressure
Making quick adjustments with one hand
Replacing the need for glue in joinery
questions.answer: Making quick adjustments with one hand
